local_intent: Lower gently onto the T-block until contact is detected, confirming touch before pushing.
assumptions: Yaw alignment to 90 degrees matches intended push edge
coherence_with_global: Implements the verify phase around LowerUntilContact from the GLOBAL_BT: after aligning and setting yaw, the arm lowers with gentle contact (slow, threshold 10) and verifies via ContactDetected before subsequent push cycles.
